Title: Dr. Nawariyan
Writer: Sri Lal Priyadeva (script by), Shobangi Purnima (dialogue)
Actors: Ranjan Ramanayake, Ruwangi Rathnayake, Srimal Wedisinghe, Sarath Chandrasiri
Plot: Nirwan Senanayake , nicknamed "Nawariyan" (literally "Nine feet tall man") is a thug: a crime don in the Colombo. Given that his father had wished him to be a medical doctor, he creates the...
